title: Royal Enfield starts local assembly unit, CKD facility in Thailand
description: Mid-sized motorcycle maker Royal Enfield said it has started local assembly unit and CKD (completely knocked down) facility in Thailand. This is the company's third local assembly unit after Argentina, and Colombia in Latin America.
